name: Kadhai Chole/Chana! (wok garbanzo beans)
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon powder or 1/2 inch cinnamon stick
1/2 teaspoon pomegranate seed powder or rock salt
1 teaspoon chole masala (optional, I did not use it. Chole fanatics probably cant live without it!)

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add 3 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 3/4 of the chopped ginger, 2 green chillies and 1/2 can garbanzo beans.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add 3 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 3/4 of the chopped ginger, 2 green chillies and 1/2 can garbanzo beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the contents and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the contents and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the oil and add all the spices ( red chillies, bay leaves, powders etc).
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the oil and add all the spices ( red chillies, bay leaves, powders etc).

recipeInstructions.text: Let them roast on medium heat for 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let them roast on medium heat for 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the puree to the pan and let simmer for 15-20 minutes until the puree thickens and starts to leave the sides of the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the puree to the pan and let simmer for 15-20 minutes until the puree thickens and starts to leave the sides of the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook the garbanzo beans for at least 2 whistles.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook the garbanzo beans for at least 2 whistles.

recipeInstructions.text: In the large pan with the puree, add the coriander leaves, the remaining ginger, cooked garbanzo beans, 1 chopped tomato, salt and sugar and water. you can add chopped red, green bell pepper too!
recipeInstructions.name: In the large pan with the puree, add the coriander leaves, the remaining ginger, cooked garbanzo beans, 1 chopped tomato, salt and sugar and water. you can add chopped red, green bell pepper too!

recipeInstructions.text: Let this simmer for 10 minutes covered on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Let this simmer for 10 minutes covered on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with some lemon juice and chopped white onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with some lemon juice and chopped white onion.
